summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Becky Martin. The documents primarily concern the payroll records of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff, focusing on individuals like Cecelia T. Morton and Nancy P. Schultz. The documents detail payroll authorizations, salary adjustments, and notifications regarding the postponement of releasing Social Security numbers due to privacy concerns. The Assassination Records Review Board is also mentioned in the context of reviewing and deciding on the release of these records.
significance: Since Becky Martin is not mentioned in the provided documents, her significance in the JFK context cannot be determined.
